clinical_study.brief_title: KinectROM Application for Assessing Range of Motion in Upper and Lower Extremity: A Development and Validation Study
clinical_study.official_title: KinectROM Application for Assessing Range of Motion in Upper and Lower Extremity: A Development and Validation Study

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of the study is to investigate the validity and reliability of KinectROM application for objectively evaluating range of motion (ROM)

detailed_description.textblock: The application KinectROM called has been developed for assessing ROM with Kinect controller by our team. So, shoulder, elbow, knee, hip and ankle ROM measurements will be made with universal goniometer and developed KinectROM application.

primary_outcome.description: ROM of shoulder, elbow, knee, hip and ankle will be made with universal goniometer and developed Kinect controller based measurement method.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Range of motion in upper extremity
arm_group.description: Assessment of shoulder: flexion/extension, abduction/adduction, internal/external rotation, elbow flexion/extension, hip: flexion/extension, abduction/adduction, internal/external rotation, knee: flexion/extension, ankle: dorsal flexion/plantar flexion

intervention.intervention_name: Assessment of Range of Motion with Kinect Controller
intervention.description: A ROM measurement method called as KinectROM by us has been developed with Kinect Controller
intervention.arm_group_label: Range of motion in upper extremity

criteria.textblock:
inclusion Criteria: -Healthy individuals with 18-40 years
Exclusion Criteria:
-Have any limited extremity between the ages of 18-40 years.
